Vendor_ID: REQUIRED FIELD. Must be exact match of active vendor.
Utility_Type: REQUIRED FIELD.  Must be exact match of utility type setup in System Settings - Picklist.
Property_ID: REQUIRED FIELD.  Must be exact match of Active or On Hold Property ID.
Unit_Id: OPTIONAL FIELD.  If no unit is selected, vendor default of drop down list of units will be available.  If in spreadsheet, must be an exact match of active units in the system.
GL_Account: OPTIONAL FIELD.  If no GL account is selected, vendor default of drop down list of GL accounts will be available.  If in spreadsheet, must be an exact match of active GL account in the system.
